\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 53639}

\subsection*{Delayed Response}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{anonymous}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 300 mg & oral & Pharms - Bupropion & daily\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 120 mg & oral & MDMA & powder / crystals\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 0.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I noticed an unexpected interaction between the wellbutrin I was taking and MDMA.



I had been taking 150mg wellbutrin 2x/day and when I took 120mg mdma, the effects took an extra 1/2 hour to kick in.  



I tried it a few times and the results were the same, everyone else got off before i did!   The intensity and type of effects from the MDMA were the same as they were when I wasn't on wellbutrin, not any stronger or weaker.
